chinese: 美国政府宣布以芬太尼等问题为由对所有中国输美商品加征10%关税。
pinyin: Měiguó政府shǎngbùyǐ fēntàn等shèmüdéwèi对suǒzhōng中国shúpào Běijíngzhaoshòu10%guówù。
translation: The U.S. government has announced a 10% tariff on all Chinese exports to the U.S. as a measure against issues involving fentanyl.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beautiful, 国 = country)
government (政 = administration, 府 = office)
to announce (宣 = to announce, 布 = to declare)
with/according to
fentanyl (芬 = fennel, 丹 = Denmark)
and/or
issues (事 = matter, 例 = example)
as a reason/measure
against/towards
all Chinese exports to the U.S.
to impose tariffs
10% tariff (税 = tax)

chinese: 这一个单边加征关税的做法严重违反世界贸易组织规则
pinyin: Zhège shǒngàng jiǎoshì guōshùi huà de suǒu yìng xìng shìjèng kuàng wèi zhīdòng qūwù zīduàn
translation: The practice of imposing unilateral tariffs on this single side severely violates the rules of the World Trade Organization.

breakdown.meaning: this (个 = individual, 这 = this/that)
unilateral (单 = single, 边 = side)
to impose tariffs (加 = add, 征 = to impose)
tariffs (关 = customs/imports, 税 = tax)
this act/policy (的 = of/for)
to violate seriously (严 = strict, 违 = to violate)
the rules of the World Trade Organization (世界 = world, 贸易 = trade, 组织 = organization)

chinese: 也对中美正常经贸合作造成破坏
pinyin: yě duì ZhongMei zuò zhǎng jìngshù shāng ché jiāo zhi huài suǒu sǔǐ kuò zhai
translation: It has also severely damaged normal trade relations between China and the United States.

breakdown.meaning: also, too
to take care of, to affect
China and the United States (中 = middle/China, 美 = beautiful/civilized)
normal, usual
economic/trade relations (经 = economic, 贸 = trade)
cooperation, partnership
to cause, to make
damage, destruction

translation: In this context or situation.

breakdown.meaning: 介词，表示‘in this’或‘at this time’
引用前文中的情况，表示现状
情境或背景，描述时间或环境

chinese: 根据《中华人民共和国关税法》《中华人民共和国海关法》《中华人民共和国对外贸易法》等法律法规和国际法基本原则
pinyin: Jīu suǒ 《Zhonghua minzu guan shui fa》《Zhonghua minzu hai guan fa》《Zhonghua minzu dui wai shang x i fa》等法律法规和国际法基本原则
translation: In accordance with the Customs Law of the People's Republic of China, the Coast Guard Law of the People's Republic of China, the Foreign Trade Law of the People's Republic of China, and various other legal provisions as well as fundamental principles of international law.

breakdown.meaning: in accordance with
Customs Law of the People's Republic of China (中华 = China, 人民共和国 = People's Republic)
Coast Guard Law of the People's Republic of China (中华 = China, 人民共和国 = People's Republic)

breakdown.character: _中华人民共和国对外贸易法》
breakdown.pinyin: 《Zhonghua minzu dui wai shang x i fa》
breakdown.meaning: Foreign Trade Law of the People's Republic of China (中华 = China, 人民共和国 = People's Republic)

breakdown.character: 等法律法规和国际法基本原则
breakdown.pinyin: děng fǎ yìu shí guān yuán he guó jìa běi zhǒng qüan
breakdown.meaning: and various other legal provisions as well as fundamental principles of international law

translation: Upon approval by the State Administration.

breakdown.meaning: manage, govern; to undergo (经 = to go through, manage)
country, nation
State Administration (国 = country, 务 = affairs/management)
to approve, grant permission (批 = to mark approval, 批准 = official approval)

translation: Starting from February 10, 2025.

breakdown.meaning: from, self (自 = from/itself)
the year 2025 (二 = two, 零 = zero, 二 = two, 五 = five; 年 = year)
February 10th (二 = two, 月 = month, 十 = ten, 日 = day)
start from, since

chinese: 国务院关税税则委员会决定对原产于美国的部分进口商品加征关税
pinyin: Guówù yuán guān shǔ shì zé huìhuì jiéming gùyòng dīběi shèngjing wùhóng shangjia
translation: The State Administration of Customs and Tariff Determination decides to impose tariffs on certain imported goods from the United States.

Customs duty (关 = customs, 律 = law)
Tariff Commission (税 = tax,則 = clause)
decide/resolve
to impose/toward
originating from the United States (原 = origin,产=product)
selected imported goods (部=part,份=fraction)
impose tariffs

translation: In, Within

breakdown.meaning: some, any (此 = this/that, 其 = some/any)
middle, center (中 = middle/center)

natural gas (天 = sky/air, 然 = nature, 气 = air/presence)
to impose an additional customs duty; to increase the tariff
fifteen percent (百分比 = percentage)
customs duty, tariff (关 = customs, 税 = tax)

crude oil (原 = original/ raw, 油 = oil)

Machinery (机 = machine, 构 = structure/weapon)

displacement (in engine terms)
car, vehicle

part of '皮卡' (pickup truck)
to add, increase
to impose a duty or tax
ten percent
customs duties, tariffs

chinese: 中方的这一举措是对美方贸易霸凌行为的有力回应
pinyin: Zhōngfāng de zhī yì shìhuì shì duì Měifāng shǒu shì zuò yànsū xìng qù de
translation: Chinese authorities' recent measures are a strong response to US trade practices.

breakdown.meaning: the measures taken by the Chinese authorities (中 = China, 方 = direction/associated with, 的 = possessive particle)
this action/measure (这 = this/that, 一 = one, 举措 = measure/action)
is against (是 = copula, 对 = to/for)

breakdown.pinyin: Měifāng shǒu shì zuò yànsū xìng qù de
breakdown.meaning: unfair trade practices by the US (美 = US, 方 = direction/associated with, 贸易 = trade,霸凌 = bullying, 行为 = behavior)
a strong response (有 = have, 力 = strength/power, 回应 = response)

chinese: 旨在捍卫自身合法权益和多边贸易体制
pinyin: zhìyǐ jiǎowèi zījǐ héifā qǔyì和duōbiān shǎngjī tǐzī
translation: purposes to uphold one's legitimate rights and the multi-lateral trade system.

breakdown.meaning: to intend, to purpose (以 = in, 的 = of)
defend or protect (巩 = strong, 卫 = guard/protect)
oneself, oneself (自 = self, 己 = oneself)
legitimate rights and interests (合 = joint, 法 = legal, 权 = right/power, 弥 = to adjust)
multi-lateral trade system (多 = many, 边 = side, 贸易 = trade, 体制 = system/organization)

translation: For a long time.

breakdown.meaning: long (长 = long)
period/length of time (期 = period, 但 = but; in this context, it refers to 'length')
since then; from then on (以 = with/reference, 来 = come); refers to a duration of time.

chinese: 美方频繁采取单边主义和贸易保护主义措施
pinyin: Měifàng jiǣngjiàn cǎizhí shídù zǔyì jiàohuòxué
translation: The U.S. frequently takes unilateralist and trade protectionist measures.

breakdown.meaning: United States (美 = beauty/harmonious, 方 = side/country)
frequently take/adopt (频 = frequent, 简 = simple/ordinary, 采 = to take, 取 = to adopt)

breakdown.character: 单边主义和贸易保护主义措施
breakdown.meaning: unilateralist and trade protection measures (单 = single/unilateral, 边 = edge/limit, 主 = main/p主体, 守 = to guard/protect,贸易 = trade, 保护 = protect,主義 = ism/主义, 措施 = measures)

chinese: 给全球经济秩序和中美经贸关系带来了严重冲击
pinyin: Gěi shǒuqū jīngjì zhìdòng hé zhongmei jingmao guānxì qī yǒu xiāng chǔn
translation: This has severely impacted the global economic order and U.S.-China trade relations.

breakdown.meaning: to give, to have given
the global economic order (世界 = world, 经济 = economy, 秩序 = order)
and
U.S.-China trade relations (中 = China, 美 = U.S., 经贸 = trade)
has brought
serious impact (严 = serious, 冲击 = shock)

chinese: 中方一直主张通过对话协商解决贸易分歧。
pinyin: Zhōngfāng yì shí zhúo zhiù qù dìào xiāng shǒu jiè hán
translation: The Chinese side has been consistently advocating for the resolution of trade disputes through dialogue and negotiation.

breakdown.meaning: Chinese side (中 = middle/China, 方 = side/agent)
consistently/always
advocate for

breakdown.pinyin: qù dìào xiāng shǒu jiè hán
breakdown.meaning: through dialogue and negotiation
resolve trade disputes (贸 = trade, 分 = disagreement, 歧 = difference)

chinese: 但美方的一意孤行迫使中方不得不采取必要的反制措施。
pinyin: Dù měifàng de yīyì gúhǎng qǔshī zhōngfàng bù dé bù cǎi jī nēi sù de fǎn zhì cuō shǒu.
translation: But the American side's solitary conduct has compelled the Chinese side to take necessary countermeasures.

breakdown.meaning: but
American side (美 = beautiful/representing America, 方 = direction/side)
going one's own way (一 = one, 意 = intention/plan)
to force/drive
Chinese side (中 = middle/China, 方 = direction/side)
cannot help but
to take

breakdown.pinyin: nēi sù de fǎn zhì cuō shǒu

breakdown.meaning: machine, mechanical (often in compound words)
skillful, clever; expert in a particular area

chinese: 将对美国相关产业的出口造成一定影响

to be influenced by, to affect (对 = to influence)
export of relevant industries in the United States (美国 = United States, 相关产业 = related industries, 的 = the, 出口 = export)
to cause a certain impact (造成 = to cause, 一定 = certain, 影响 = impact)

breakdown.meaning: together, same (通用于表示相同或一起的意思，具体含义根据语境而定)
time (时间点或时段，具体含义根据语境而定)

also (表语助词，表示重复或补充)
to remind (提 = to mention, 催 = to prompt; 亦 = also, 惠 = to be kind)
U.S. government or authorities (美 =美，方 =way/side)

translation: There are no winners in the trade war.

Not have, lack, no

through, by means of
equality, equal status

benefit/interest (利 = benefit/interest)

chinese: 才能实现双方经济的健康稳定发展
pinyin: Cóngjīhuà shuǒbàng jìmíng de jìakéyì jiansuwdékuài fāzhòng
translation: Only then can we achieve the stable and healthy development of economic relations between both sides.

to achieve, to make sure (实现 = to ensure)

stable and healthy development (健康 = healthy, 稳定 = stable)

chinese: 每天早上，他用手机看新闻，也用手机学习中文。
pinyin: Měitiān zǎoshang, tā yòng shǒujī kàn xīnwén, yě yòng shǒujī xuéxí Zhōngwén.
translation: Every morning, he uses his phone to read the news and learn Chinese.

morning (早 = early, 上 = up/on)
he, him
to use
mobile phone (手 = hand, 机 = machine)
